item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (509 points | 447 comments)
2. SWE-Bench tainted by answer leakage; real pass rates significantly lower (74 points | 6 comments)
3. Removing Jeff Bezos from my bed (140 points | 63 comments)
4. Why Ruby on Rails still matters (40 points | 13 comments)
5. DeepDive in everything of Llama3: revealing detailed insights and implementation (47 points | 3 comments)
6. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (177 points | 77 comments)
7. I think Yann Lecun was right about LLMs (but perhaps only by accident) (38 points | 19 comments)
8. Launch HN: Massdriver (YC W22) – Self-serve cloud infra without the red tape (26 points | 28 comments)
9. The CRPG Renaissance, Part 3: TSR Is Dead (26 points | 4 comments)
10. Posh (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. Johnny.Decimal – A system to organise your life (174 points | 120 comments)

13. Every .gov Domain (237 points | 193 comments)
14. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (92 points | 72 comments)
15. Richard Feynman's Blackboard at the Time of His Death (1988) (9 points | 2 comments)
16. Train Your Own O1 Preview Model Within $450 (336 points | 53 comments)

18. The Profitable Startup (50 points | 11 comments)
19. Show HN: Immersive Gaussian Splat experience of Sutro Tower, San Francisco (754 points | 179 comments)
20. All Is Unfinished: Henri Bergson's philosophy for our times (16 points | 3 comments)
21. Lithium-sulfur battery retains 80% charge capacity after 25,000 cycles (23 points | 3 comments)
22. NASA's James Webb Space Telescope faces potential 20% budget cut (14 points | 1 comment)
23. Meta claims torrenting pirated books isn't illegal without proof of seeding (517 points | 352 comments)
24. Fly To Podman: a script that will help you to migrate from Docker (98 points | 62 comments)
25. Rare Photos from Inside North Korea's 'Hotel of Doom' (2023) (138 points | 64 comments)
26. Show HN: BadSeek – How to backdoor large language models (414 points | 85 comments)
27. Sweden Investigates New Cable Break Under Baltic Sea (147 points | 101 comments)
28. Old Bob's Old Typewriters (10 points | 5 comments)
